content:
For the List Resource in R4, List.entry has no orderMeaning. However there is List.orderedBy which, in my eyes, gives the collection of List.entry an order meaning. Should the spec contain a orderMeaning like "See List.orderedBy"?

I ask because I try to collect a list of all collections for which an implementation is supposed to preserve the order of elements. If I only look at orderMeaning there aren't many ordered collections. But for List.entry I would expect that implementations should preserve the order.
sounds like a good thing to make a task about
@Alexander Kiel can you submit a change request?
@Lloyd McKenzie I have created one here: https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=24878
